definition: a faulty stroke in calligraphy or painting/a faulty expression in writing
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: That is the syndrome. It is self- defeating and self-sabotaging.
sentences.chinese: 这就是“新一年决策综合症”，是自暴自弃的败笔。

sentences.english: Tetis a military disaster for the North Vietnamese.
sentences.chinese: 春节对于北越来说是军事上的败笔。

sentences.english: But it seems more like laziness and bad planning.
sentences.chinese: 然在吾观之，此更似怠惰和昏招下的败笔。

sentences.english: It is a great failure that China did not erased Lamaism in Tibet.
sentences.chinese: 中国一直未能铲除喇嘛教是一大败笔。

sentences.english: Another downfall of most surveys is that they try to do too much.
sentences.chinese: 另一个大多数调查表的败笔是有太多的问题。

sentences.english: Innovation became a faulty stroke in calligraphy or painting, worth while people is being adapted classical when thoughtful.
sentences.chinese: 创新变成了败笔，值得人们在改编经典时深思。

sentences.english: You primp as brothel woman by the body of place son, is exactly your biggest flaw in prose.
sentences.chinese: 你以处子之身假扮青楼女子，正是你最大的败笔。

sentences.english: But was he also its most spectacular political failure?
sentences.chinese: 但是，难道这也是他政治上的最大败笔吗？

sentences.english: I think bringing on Inzaghi was a big mistake from Ancelotti.
sentences.chinese: 我认为引进因扎吉是安切洛蒂的一个败笔。

definition: to paint a dragon and dot in the eyes (idiom); fig. to add the vital finishing touch/the crucial point that brings the subject to life/a few words to clinch the point
foreshadowing (literary device)/foretaste of material to come (in essay or story)
everything is fine except for one small defect (idiom); the fly in the ointment
lit. a blemish does not obscure jade's luster/the pros outweigh the cons (idiom)
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
lit. tiger's head, snake's tail (idiom); fig. a strong start but weak finish
